ai-ud7.1:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-ud7.1:1.3_0: Now at that time Venerable Sāriputta was educating, encouraging, firing up, and inspiring Venerable Bhaddiya the Dwarf with a Dhamma talk.
ai-ud7.1:2.1_0: Then after being taught like this Bhaddiya’s mind was freed from defilements by not grasping.
ai-ud7.1:3.1_0: The Buddha saw what was happening.
ai-ud7.1:4.1_0: Then, knowing the significance of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud7.1:5.3_0: Freed like this, he has crossed the flood
ai-ud7.1:5.4_0: not crossed before, so as to not be reborn.”
